text: Now is our chance to unite against the Vikings and retake our Kingdom!
Every Saxon Kingdom that falls is one fewer ally in the North. We must intervene.
The enemy of my enemy is my friend.
We will not die fighting a Viking conflict, regardless of the gold offered.
We must gather our strength if we are to reclaim our Kingdom. This war will not benefit us
We cannot afford another war with the Vikings right now.
The resurgence of the Saxons in the south is our opportunity to reclaim our Kingdom!
Where were our Saxon brothers when Jórvík first invaded? We will not help them.
We don't want their loyalty, we want their land!
We will support the Nobles against West Seaxe
They must fight this war on their own
By spending some of our wealth, we could entice more of Wessex's vassals into betraying them.
We will honour Rhodri's legacy and avenge his death!
Vengeance ought not to compel us to follow Rhodri to the grave. A war with Mierce would be foolish right now.
